data.title: Our Beers
data.meta_description: Discover a unique range of craft beers at Evil Genius Beer Company. Dive into our collection and find your new favorite brew today!
data.text:
Work Sucks, I Know!

I'll be your thrill!

You know what doesn't suck? The tropical and citrus-forward flavors of Galaxy and Citra hops, that's what.

STYLE:Galaxy and Citra Session IPA

ABV:5.0%

IBU:35

HOPS:Galaxy, Citra

MALTS:2-row, Wheat

#Adulting

A guava IPA that paid its rent on time.

Adulting is hard. Finding a delicious IPA should not be. Well, look no further. This smooth IPA is infused with all-natural guava flavor, making it the perfect reward for remembering to turn the oven off.

STYLE:Guava IPA

ABV:6.8%

IBU:38

HOPS:Cascade, Citra, Warrior

MALTS:Crystal 15, Pale

Stacy’s Mom

You're in love with this beer

One of our year-round flagship beers, Stacy's Mom is an IPA with low bitterness and lots of hop flavor. It's dry-hopped entirely with Citra, which, as you may have guessed, gets its name from its strong citrus notes.

STYLE:Citra IPA

ABV:7.5%

IBU:42

HOPS:Citra, Warrior

MALTS:Pale

There’s No Crying In Baseball

IPA with a wicked curveball

Hazy and refreshing, this beer knocks it out of the park with a hefty dose of dry hops and natural mango flavor. You could say it's in a league of its own.

STYLE:Hazy Mango IPA

ABV:6.0%

IBU:30

HOPS:Amarillo, Mosaic, Vic Secret

MALTS:Pale, Wheat
